General.Name: Artois Nom.
General.Description: Société Industrielle et Financière de l'Artois Société anonyme designs, manufactures, markets, and sells terminals, bollards, access control, and automatic identification systems. It operates in France, Europe, the Asia-Pacific, and the Americas. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Puteaux, France.
General.Address: 31-32, quay of Dion Button, Puteaux, France, 92811
